description:
Remember those chocolate almonds you loved as a kid? Whittaker’s Almond Gold slab is like that, but better. And, now you don’t have to share.

  • Ingredients: milk chocolate [sugar, cocoa solids 33%* (pure cocoa butter &cocoa mass), NZ milk powder 30%*, emulsifier (soy lecithin), vanilla flavour]; roasted almonds 26%. *Minimum percentage
  • Allergens, contains: almonds and milk, may contain: peanuts, other tree nuts and gluten
  • Whittaker’s is New Zealand’s finest chocolate and has been since 1896
  • Ghanian cocoa pods are sun-dried before processing in small batches in Porirua New Zealand
  • Rainforest alliance certified
name: Whittaker's Almond Gold Chocolate Slab
